title: abdullahazeem2034
author: abdullahazeem2034
content: We have create a Honeypot Checker to find honeypot token on BSC Network. You can get following information regarding token from its contract addressToken Name TokenSymbolBuying (Gas)Selling (Gas)Buy Tax %Sell Tax %You can visit our Honeypot Detector https://honeypotdetector.net before buying any BSC token.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: abdullahazeem2034 on May 22, 2022, 04:48:40 AMBuying (Gas)Selling (Gas)Isn't Gas for buying and selling every single token the same and adjustable by user to speed up transaction when there is increased network traffic.Quote from: abdullahazeem2034 on May 22, 2022, 04:48:40 AMBuy Tax %Sell Tax %If token have buy tax/ sell tax its not a token you should buy.
